A randomized placebo-controlled trial of pre-treatment and short- or long-term maintenance therapy with amiodarone supporting DC cardioversion for persistent atrial fibrillation  Eur Heart J, 25 (2004), pp. 144-150 CrossrefView in ScopusGoogle Scholar 
24J. Galperin, M.V. Elizari, P.A. Chiale, et al. Efficacy of amiodarone for the termination of chronic atrial fibrillation and maintenance of normal sinus rhythm: a prospective, multicenter, randomized, controlled, double blind trial  J Cardiovasc Pharmacol Ther, 6 (2001), pp. 341-350 CrossrefView in ScopusGoogle Scholar
query: atrial fibrillation recurrence rates maintenance therapy amiodarone beta-blockers long-term outcomes rhythm maintenance
title: Comparative efficacy of dronedarone and amiodarone for the maintenance of sinus rhythm in patients with atrial fibrillation
authors: Jonathan P. Piccini, Vic Hasselblad, Eric D. Peterson, Jeffrey B. Washam, Robert M. Califf, David F. Kong
journal: Journal of the American College of Cardiology
reference: Piccini, J. P., Hasselblad, V., Peterson, E. D., Washam, J. B., Califf, R. M., & Kong, D. F. (2009). Comparative efficacy of dronedarone and amiodarone for the maintenance of sinus rhythm in patients with atrial fibrillation. Journal of the American College of Cardiology, 54(12), 1089-1095.
